name: Guiding Light (itch) (eagas)
description:
You are a Light Catcher trying to reach the top of a castle. Light the way by collecting fireflies along your path. If you encounter enemies, you can shoot the light to defeat them. However, be careful! If you shoot too much light, you may lose your way.
